name: Zig Zag Racers
description:
Zig Zag Racers is a one touch infinite racing game.

Unusually, a brand new racing experience on asphalt. Simple controls. Define the direction with one touch on the screen. Be careful, your speed is constantly increasing. Collect the coins on the floor and buy new cars from the shop. Share your score with your friends at the end of each race. Start your career as a beginner and prove how good you are a racer.

Realistic vehicle physics experiences,
Different tracks and weather conditions,
Compatible for mobile and tablet devices,
Different tools, different experiences,
High quality graphics compatible with mobile.

Get totally free, enjoy!

For All Questions : support@optogames.com
